title: Liquid staking outperforms bearish market as Lido growth fuels $20B TVL
description:
The total value of assets locked (TVL) in liquid staking projects has continued to climb despite the overwhelming bearish sentiments present in the market. DeFillama’s data reveals an impressive surge in the category’s TVL, which has reached almost $20 billion in the past year. Notably, this growth has outpaced other sectors in decentralized finance, including […]

The post Liquid staking outperforms bearish market as Lido growth fuels $20B TVL appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Technical Analysis: BTC Slips Below Key Support Point as US Markets Reopen Following Labor Day
description: Bitcoin moved lower on Tuesday, as U.S. traders returned from the Labor Day celebration, bringing back bearish sentiment with them. The global crypto market cap was down by 0.47% at the time of writing. Ethereum remained in the red, with price trading below a recent support point. Bitcoin Bitcoin fell further below the $26,000 level […]

title: Unleashing the Potential of the Metaverse and AI’s Role in Shaping Virtual Worlds

title: Cronos launches its third accelerator program
description: The blockchain network Cronos Labs has announced the launching of its third accelerator program. The initiative will target new dapps in the crypto industry at an early development stage with an investment of $100 million. The accelerator program will last…

title: Cronos Labs Dedicates $100M to Propel Blockchain Innovators Forward
description: The third chapter of the accelerator initiative promises growth for emerging blockchain startups during Korea Blockchain Week. Cronos Labs is setting the stage for its next chapter, opening applications for the 3rd cohort of the Cronos Accelerator Program with $100 million of investment backing. This initiative, unveiled during Korea Blockchain Week on September 4, seeks [...]

title: Liquid Staking Up by 292% Since Low Point in June 2022
description:
According to Bloomberg’s latest article published on September 5, the crypto liquid staking sector is very close to touching its all-time high value back in early 2022. Data from DeFiLlama confirmed that the total value of assets locked within liquid staking services has surged by 292% since hitting a low point in June 2022, during […]

The post Liquid Staking Up by 292% Since Low Point in June 2022 appeared first on Coin Edition.
